snippet: Although Bryant was born in Philadelphia, there has often been tension between him and 76ers fans. Now that Bryant has announced his retirement, the city showed him some love during a Lakers loss.
abstract: Los Angeles Lakers shooting guard Kobe Bryant, having announced he will retire at end of season, begins unofficial farewell tour with 103-91 loss to 76ers in Philadelphia, city with which he has complicated history, having spent many of his teenage years there.

byline.contributor: Billy Witz contributed reporting from Los Angeles.

lead_paragraph: Although Bryant was born in Philadelphia, there has often been tension between him and 76ers fans. Now that Bryant has announced his retirement, the city showed him some love during a Lakers loss.

headline.main: In Philadelphia, a Feel-Good Moment for Kobe Bryant, if a Brief One
headline.print_headline: It’s a Feel-Good Moment for Bryant, if a Brief One
